name: Moodboarder
description: A simple utility to view your images in a grid.
author: hcrev

scripts.build:minify: for i in dist/*.js; do uglifyjs "$i" -o "$i"; done
scripts.watch: light-server -s dist -b 127.0.0.1 -w "app/**/*.js, app/**/*.html # npm run build:static && npm run concat:js && npm run concat:vendor" -w "app/styles/*.scss # npm run compile:scss # reloadcss"
scripts.build: npm run build:static && npm run compile:scss && npm run concat:js && npm run concat:vendor && npm run build:minify
